st: Kabhi Mohabbat Karo Toh Hum Se Karna,
s:
Kabhi Mohabbat Karo Toh Hum Se Karna,
Dil Ki Baat Juba Par Aaye Toh Hum Se Kahna,

Na Kah Sako Toh Aankhein Jhuka Lena,
Hum Samajh Jaayenge Hamein Kuchh Na Kahna…

st: Churakar Dil Toh Mera Woh Bekhabar Se Baithe Hain,
s:
Churakar Dil Toh Mera Woh Bekhabar Se Baithe Hain,
Milate Nahi Najar Nahi Humse Woh Chat Par Aan Baithe Hain,

Dekh Kar Humko Kitab Se Mooh Chhipakar Baithe Hain,
Unhein Khud Nahi Maalum Ki Woh Kya Kar Baithe Hain…

st: Mana Ki Tumhein Mujhse Jyada Gham Hoga,
s:
Mana Ki Tumhein Mujhse Jyada Gham Hoga,
Magar Rone Se Yeh Gham Kabhi Na Kam Hoga,

Jeet Hi Lenge Dil Ki Nakam Baaziyan Hum,
Agar Mohabbat Mein Hamari Dam Hoga….

st: Khata Pahli Samajh Kar Maaf Kar Dena,
s:
Khata Pahli Samajh Kar Maaf Kar Dena,
Raah E Wafa Mein Ho Jaaye Jo Gunaah Hamse,

Mohabbat Ki Hadein Paar Kar Chuke Hain Sanam,
Phir Kaise Hain Dilbar Yeh Parde Hum Se….

st: Nibhaoge Tum Kasmein Yeh Wada Na Karo,
s:
Nibhaoge Tum Kasmein Yeh Wada Na Karo,
Mohabbat Humse Itni Jyada Na Karo,

Dekhe Hain Maine Bhi Daur Tabahi Ke,
Aur Hamein Sataane Ka Irada Na Karo…

st: Zindagi Se Sabhi Ko Mohabbat Hai,
s:
Zindagi Se Sabhi Ko Mohabbat Hai,
Par Zindagi Kisi Ki Mohabbat Nahi Banti,
Tamanna Le Kar Jeete Hai Sab Log,
Magar Har Tamanna Taqdeer Nahi Banti…

st: Zindagi Hasin Hai Zindagi Se Pyaar Karo,
s:
Zindagi Hasin Hai Zindagi Se Pyaar Karo,
Hai Rat To Subah Ka Intzar Karo,
Wo Pal Bhi Ayega Jiska Intzaar Hai Aap Ko,
Rab Pr Bhrosa Or Waqt Pe Aitbar Rakho…

st: Nigahon Par Nagahon Ke Pher Hoten Hai,
s:
Nigahon Par Nagahon Ke Pher Hoten Hai,
In Nigahone Ke Ghav Bhi Gehare Hoten Hai,
Jane Kyon Kosten Hain Hum Badsurato Ko,
Barbad Karne Wale To Haseen Chehare Hi Hote Hai…

st: Mohabbat Se Reha Hona Zarori Hai,
s:
Mohabbat Se Reha Hona Zarori Hai,
Mera Tujh Se Juda Hona Zarori Hai,
Wafa Ke Tajurbe Karte Hue To Umar Guzri,
Zara Sa Bewafa Hona Zarori Hai,
Meri Aawaz Tanhai Main Marti Ja Rahi Hai,
Kisi Ka Hamnawa Hona Zaarori Hai…

st: Woh Chamkate Bhalvoos Dekho,
s:
Woh Chamkate Bhalvoos Dekho,
Pahan Kar Aaye Hain,

Aaj Fir Kisi Par Fareb Ki,
Bizliyan Girane Aaye Hain,

Woh Husn Gurur Woh Adayein,
Dikhane Ke Liye Aaye Hain,

Woh Nadano Ko Mohabbat Ka,
Khwab Dikhane Aaye Hain….

st: Sitaron Ki Mahfil Dekhkar,
s:
Sitaron Ki Mahfil Dekhkar,
Pyar Ki Mahfil Yaad Aati Hai,

Chand Ko Falak Mein Dekhkar,
Mahboob Ki Yaad Aati Hai….

st: Abke Baras Woh Nahi Aaye Bahar Mein,
s:
Abke Baras Woh Nahi Aaye Bahar Mein,
Gujrega Ab Ek Baras Intezar Mein,

Tute Dil Mein Teri Mohabbat Tera Khyal,
Khush Rang Ho Bahar Ke Gujri Bahar Mein…

st: Chand Lamhe Hamein Pyar Ke Udhar De De,
s:
Chand Lamhe Hamein Pyar Ke Udhar De De,
Ki Marne Se Pahle Hamein Jhuta Karar De De,

Kuchh Der Hi Teri Yaad Mere Dil Se Mit Jaaye,
Yahi Soch Kar Tu Thoda Sa Sharab De De

st: Ishq Mohabbat Toh Hazaron Karte Hain,
s:
Ishq Mohabbat Toh Hazaron Karte Hain,
Gham E Judai Se Woh Sabhi Darte Hain,

Hum Toh Na Ishq Karte Hain, Na Mohabbat Karte Hain,
Hum Toh Bas Dosto Ki Ek Muskurahat Par Marte Hain….

st: Kismat Se Apni Sabko Sikayat Kyu Hoti Hai,
s:
Kismat Se Apni Sabko Sikayat Kyu Hoti Hai,
Jo Nahi Milta Usi Se Mohabbat Kyu Hoti Hai,

Kitne Khade Rahte Hain Raahon Mein Dil Ki, Fir Bhi,
Dil Ko Usi Ki Mohabbat Kyu Hoti Hai…

st: Jab Mohabbat Ki Daastan Dil Sunayega,
s:
Jab Mohabbat Ki Daastan Dil Sunayega,
Humko Koi Bichhuda Sathi Yaad Aayega,

Hum Bhool Jaayenge Zindagi Ke Ghamon Ko,
Jab Saath Gujra Vakt Yaad Aayega…

st: Abhi Abhi Toh Aaye Ho Eh Mere Hamdam,
s:
Abhi Abhi Toh Aaye Ho Eh Mere Hamdam,
Aur Abhi Jaane Ki Baat Karte Ho,

Yeh Kaisi Hai Sanam Mohabbat Aapki,
Aap Dil Dukhane Ki Baat Karte Ho….

st: Is Liye Karta Nahi Yeh Mohabbat Kisi Se,
s:
Is Liye Karta Nahi Yeh Mohabbat Kisi Se,
Judayi Yaar Ki Is Se Sahi Jaayegi Nahi,

Koi Puchh Baitha Jo Sabab Hamare Rone Ka,
Dastaa Pyar Ki Bhi Kahi Jaayegi Nahi…

st: Din Ho Bhale Hi Raat Ho,
s:
Din Ho Bhale Hi Raat Ho,
Bas Yaad Teri Hi Aati Hai,

Kaise Kahu Ke Main Theek Hu,
Yeh Hardam Mujhko Rulati Hai,

Ab Toh Yaaro Khud Se Bhi,
Mujhko Wafa Ki Umeed Nahi,

Mohabbat Aisi Shaii Hai Yaaro,
Jise Sakte Kabhi Kharid Nahi…

st: Humne Toh Bas Itna Hi Sikha Hai Dosto,
s:
Humne Toh Bas Itna Hi Sikha Hai Dosto,
Raah E Mohabbat Mein Kabhi Kinara Nahi Milta,

Jo Mil Jaaye Is Raah Par Kabhi Yaar Se,
Woh Jakham Kabhi Bhi Fir Dobara Nahi Silta…

st: Chhod Do Tanhai Mein Mujhko Yaaro,
s:
Chhod Do Tanhai Mein Mujhko Yaaro,
Saath Mere Rahkar Kya Paaoge,

Agar Ho Gayi Aapko Bhi Mohabbat Kabhi,
Sagar Ki Tarah Tum Bhi Pachhtaoge…

st: Bas Itna Hi Bahut Hai Hamare Liye Eh Ajij Mere,
s:
Bas Itna Hi Bahut Hai Hamare Liye Eh Ajij Mere,
Ki Aapki Jubaa Par Naam Hamara Aaya Toh Tha,

Aapne Bhi Ki Thi Hamse Mohabbat Eh Yaar Mere,
Sagar Ke Dil Ko Kabhi Mohabbat Mein Dhadkaya Toh Tha….

st: Karoge Yaad Tum Yaro, Ki Sagar Kahta Tha Kabhi,
s:
Karoge Yaad Tum Yaro, Ki Sagar Kahta Tha Kabhi,
Doulat Aur Mohabbat Ka, Na Kabhi Bhi Mel Hota Hai,

Hoti Hai Jinke Liye Doulat Hi Sab Se Badhkar,
Unke Liye Toh Yeh Mohabbat, Fakt Ek Khel Hota Hai…

st: Yeh Bhi Na Kah Paaye, Ki Tumse Mohabbat Karte Hain,
s:
Yeh Bhi Na Kah Paaye, Ki Tumse Mohabbat Karte Hain,
Tumhare Liye Hi Jeete Hain, Tumhare Liye Hi Marte Hain,

Kitni Mohabbat Karte Hain Yeh Toh Dil Hi Jaanta Hai,
Magar Na Kahenge Kisi Se, Ki Akele Aahein Bharte Hain…

st: Yeh Mana Ke Mohabbat Karna Hai Jurm Magar,
s:
Yeh Mana Ke Mohabbat Karna Hai Jurm Magar,
Yeh Jurm Yaaro Baar Baar Karte Hain Hum,

Woh Bewafa Hai Sangdil Hain Jaante Hai Magar,
Unpar Yaaro Aaj Bhi Aitbaar Karte Hain Hum…

st: Kaise Samjhaun Main Apne Nadan Dil Ko,
s:
Kaise Samjhaun Main Apne Nadan Dil Ko,
Yeh Galti Se Aisi Himakat Kar Baitha,

Bahut Roka Maine Isko Aisa Karne Se,
Magar Na Jaane Kyun Mohabbat Kar Baitha…

st: Kudrat Ka Yeh Usul Hai,
s:
Kudrat Ka Yeh Usul Hai,
Ki Aana Jana Hai Bari Bari,

Kya Karenge Yaaro Woh Mohabbat,
Jinko Sirf Dhan Daulat Hai Pyari…

st: Unko Malum Nahi Hai Mohabbat Ka Matlab Shayad,
s:
Unko Malum Nahi Hai Mohabbat Ka Matlab Shayad,
Is Mein Toh Begano Ko Bhi Apna Liya Karte Hain,

Khud Bhale Kitne Bhi Gham Pade Sahne Magar,
Doosron Ko Bas Khusi Hi Diya Karte Hain…

st: Are Aap Kyun Nahi Samajhate Ho Sanam,
s:
Are Aap Kyun Nahi Samajhate Ho Sanam,
Dil Ka Dard Dabta Nahi Hai Dabane Se,

Aapko Mohabaat Ka Ijhaar Karna Hi Padega,
Kyunki Mohabaat Chhupti Nahi Hai Chhupane Se…

st: Kaghaj Par Nahi Likhte Kuch Raaz Mohabbat Ke,
s:
Kaghaj Par Nahi Likhte Kuch Raaz Mohabbat Ke,
Pal Bhar Mein Bikhar Jaate Hain Alfaaz Mohabbat Ke,

Use Toot Kar Chaha Toh Hum Khud Hi Bikhar Gaye,
Aise Badal Jaate Hain Andaaj Mohabbat Ke,

Un ki Saheliyo Se Zara Kahna, Unhe Sath Hi Laaye,
Mujhe Phir Se Sajaane Hain Kuch Khwab Mohabbat Ke,

Apni To Saase Dost Usi Waqt Mein Thee Shaamil,
Kyun Baithe Huve Chor Gaye Kuch Haath Mohabbat Ke….

st: Roothe Huye Hain Jo Humse,
s:
Roothe Huye Hain Jo Humse,
Hum Unko Khud Hi Mana Lenge,
Soyi Huyi Apni Kismat Ko,
Hum Fir Se Yaaron Jaga Lenge…

st: Mohabbat Humne Bhi Ki Thi,
s:
Mohabbat Humne Bhi Ki Thi,
Magar Tumko Batayein Kya,
Mile Hain Gham Hamein Ismein,
Magar Tumko Sunayein Kya…

st: Hamne Toh Apni Mohabbat Ka Ijhaar Kiya,
s:
Hamne Toh Apni Mohabbat Ka Ijhaar Kiya,
Magar Usne Fir Bhi Na Hamara Eitbaar Kiya,

Sagat Toh Jahan Se Lada, Ek Uski Khatir,
Us Bewafa Ne Sikwa Fir Bhi Hazaar Kiya…

st: Ek Tere Chale Jaane Ke Baada Hamein,
s:
Ek Tere Chale Jaane Ke Baada Hamein,
Kisi Ka Bhi Yahan Eitbaar Na Raha,

Aur Kisi Se Toh Kya Karenge Mohabbat,
Jab Apni Hi Zindagi Se Pyar Na Raha…

st: Hamne Bahut Dekhi Hai Yeh Duniya,
s:
Hamne Bahut Dekhi Hai Yeh Duniya,
Yeh Kisi Ko Jeene Bhi Nahi Deti Hai,

Aap Khule Aam Kahte Hain Karenge Mohabbat,
Yeh Toh Jakhamon Ko Seene Bhi Nahi Deti Hai…

st: Log Aksar Puchhte Hain Tumhaare Baare Mein,
s:
Log Aksar Puchhte Hain Tumhaare Baare Mein,
Magar Hum Apni Kahani Sunayen Kyu,

Hamari Mohabbat Ko Poojenge Tum Dekhna,
Magar Hum Apni Jubani Batayen Kyu…

st: Ek Din Aap Hamein Hi Chahoge Dekh Lena,
s:
Ek Din Aap Hamein Hi Chahoge Dekh Lena,
Hum Khuda Se Aapko Maang Laayenge Dekh Lena,

Shayad Aapko Hamari Mohabbat Ka Ehsas Nahi Hai,
Aapse Hi Iska Izhaar Karvaayenge Dekh Lena…

st: Mohabbat Mangi Thi Mohabbat Ke Badle,
s:
Mohabbat Mangi Thi Mohabbat Ke Badle,
Tum Woh Bhi Humko De Na Sake,
Dil Ko Chaha Jab Kahin Aur Bahlana,
Is Baat Ko Bhi Tum Sah Na Sake,

st: Hum Kisi Ko Apna Banayein Yahan,
s:
Hum Kisi Ko Apna Banayein Yahan,
Shyad Yeh Kismat Ko Manjoor Nahi Tha,
Aapka Is Kadar Ruthna Humse,
Shayad Yeh Mohabbat Ka Dastoor Nahi Thaa…

st: Hum Khud Hi Chhod Denge Teri Duniya Eh Dost,
s:
Hum Khud Hi Chhod Denge Teri Duniya Eh Dost,
Bas Do Char Sanso Ki Aur Ijajat De Do,

Bhale Karna Nafrat Magar Kuchhh Lamhon Ke Liye,
Mohabbat Ka Bharm Toh Rahe Itni Mohabbat De Do…

st: Aap Humko Aise Mat Dekhiye,
s:
Aap Humko Aise Mat Dekhiye,
Kahin Humko Mohabbat Na Ho Jaaye,

Aap Toh Muskura Kar Chale Jaaoge,
Is Dil Ko Musibat Na Ho Jaaye…

st: Hamari Mohabbaat Ki Baat Kuchh Is Tarah Se Faili,
s:
Hamari Mohabbaat Ki Baat Kuchh Is Tarah Se Faili,
Ki Har Ek Ki Labon Par Yeh Jubaani Ho Gayi,

Saagar Ne Toh Kiya Tha Aapse Sacha Pyar Magar,
Is Ki Mohabbat Ki Aaj Dekho Kahani Ho Gayi…

st: Na Jaane Yeh Kaisa Hai Mola, Dastoor E Mohabaat,
s:
Na Jaane Yeh Kaisa Hai Mola, Dastoor E Mohabaat,
Woh Door Rahkar Bhi Dil Ke Karib Rahta Hai,

Har Koi Jaanta Hai Milenge Ismein Jakham, Fir Bhi,
Har Koi, Yaar Ka Diya Dard, Hans Kar Sahta Hai…

st: Bhigi huyi aankhon ka yeh manjar na milega
s:
Bhigi huyi aankhon ka yeh manjar na milega
Ghar chhod kar mat jaao kahin ghar na milega,

Fir yaad bahut aayegi julfon ki ghani shyam
Jab dhoop mein shaya koi sar par na milega,

Aansu ko kabhi os ka katra na samjhana
Aisa tumhe chahat ka samander na milega,

st: Dekho Jo Vakt Ki Yeh Jabardast Himakat,
s:
Dekho Jo Vakt Ki Yeh Jabardast Himakat,
Jiska Chaman Ujaada Us Par Hi Jadi Tohmat,

Koi Bhi Wahan Hota Vaisa Hi Woh Bhi Karta,
Shayad Use Mil Jaati Kuchh Sanso Ki Mohlat,

Chilla Ke Apna Apna Begana Karne Waale,
Aise Bhi Kahin Hoti Hai Apno Se Bhi Bagawat,

Tum Pahle Mile Hote Hum Door Nikal Jaate,
Aisi Hi Ganjada Si Hua Karti Hai Mohabbat,

Mujhko Mere Mijaj Ne Aawara Bana Dala,
Aisa Hi Kiya Karti Hai Apno Ki Adavat…

st: Dil Ki Taklife Batana Kya,
s:
Dil Ki Taklife Batana Kya,
Jakham Kitane Hain Ginana Kya,

Jaan Jaayega Jamana Khud Use,
Jamane Ko Muh Lagana Kya,

Kahne Ko Hain Apne Log Sabhi,
Kisi Ke Bhi Saath Jana Kya,

Ek Baar Use Parakh Dekha,
Kase Ko Fir Aajmana Kya,

Musibat Wala Safar Bhi Hai,
Par Mohabbat Ko Bhulana Kya,

Jaane Kya Kya Hai Khajane Mein,
Chor Darwaja Dikhana Kya…

st: Likhi Hawa Par Teri Baatein,
s:
Likhi Hawa Par Teri Baatein,
Jinko Ab Tak Mousam Gaate,

Chhalki Woh Nigah Ki Masti,
Ab Tak Sabhi Jaam Chhalkate,

Thahre Huye Jamane Abh Bhi,
Katha Kahani Madur Sunate,

Roop Chandani Pyar Mohabbat,
Narm Nigahon Ki Sougatein,

Kiska Noor Chhalkte Dekha,
Sab Tera Darbar Batate…

st: Ab Nahi Dil Ko Koi Darkar Hai,
s:
Ab Nahi Dil Ko Koi Darkar Hai,
Shyah Aur Safed Sab Bekar Hai,

Rone Hansane Wale Kisse Sab Bekar,
Bandhne Ko Riste Hain Ghar Bar Hai,

Nahin Badlenge Jamane Ke Niyam Yeh,
Aadami Bhi Chalan Ke Anusar Hai,

Bhav Unche Hain Bahut Insaniyat Ke,
Yahin Par Toh Aadami Laachar Hai,

Mohabbat Ki Kahani Ke Penchokham Yeh,
Do Dilo Ki Dastaa Vayapar Hai…

st: Kabhi Palat Kar Dekho Duniya,
s:
Kabhi Palat Kar Dekho Duniya,
Kya Lamba Choda Afsana,

Najron Mein Aa Jaye Mohabbat,
Chal Nikalega Gham Begana,

Dil Ke Hathon Dard Uthakar,
Bhatak Raha Ab Tak Diwana,

Vaise Toh Anmol Zindagi,
Kyu Kodi Ke Bhav Lutana,

Desh Ki Mitti Chandan Jaisi,
Are Doodh Ki Laaj Nibhana…

st: Ahsas Dard Wale Dil Ko Nichodate Hain,
s:
Ahsas Dard Wale Dil Ko Nichodate Hain,
Jajbat Se Kisi Ke Bhi Aise Na Kheliye,

Insaniyat Ke Dushman Paate Nahi Mohabbat,
Iljaam Unke Hamne Apne Sar Pe Le Liye,

Aise Hi Nahin Khusiyan Mil Jaati Chahne Se,
Kuchh Dariya Toh Bahaiye Parbat Useliye,

Mushkil Toh Nahin Hai Kuch Jab Dil Mein Than Lein,
Mumkin Hain Khwabon Ke Mahal Insano Ke Liye,

Auro Ke Liye Jite Huye Dekha Jamane Ne,
Jadu Chalega Ek Din Kuchh Aur Jheliye…

st: Dekh Sunkar Asliyat Dil Fat Gaya,
s:
Dekh Sunkar Asliyat Dil Fat Gaya,
Paake Uska Likha Khat Dil Phat Gaya,

Bhesh Sadu Ka Banakar Chal Diye,
Aisi Unki Mohabbat Dil Fat Gaya,

Ek Nanhi Jaan Aur Sitam Hazaron,
Karte Karte Ibadat Dil Phat Gaya,

Khun Ke Riste Bhi Bemani Huye Ab,
Samjhate Hi Yeh Sifat Dil Phat Gaya,

Adab Pahle Yahan Ki Pahchan Si Thi,
Beadab Ab Siyasat Dil Fat Gaya…
